description: Try our easy to follow Tuna, Quinoa & Rice Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice salad,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Summer,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tuna, Quinoa & Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup frozen boad beans, soaked in hot water

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare rice and quinoa blend according to packet instructions. Transfer to a bowl.
Meanwhile shell eggs and half. Squeeze broad beans from pods. Combine rice blend, beans, tomato, capsicum, onion, parsley and olives in a bowl.
To make the dressing, whisk oil, lemon juice and garlic together in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Pour dressing over rice mixture and toss well to combine.
Divide spinach between bowls. Add the rice mixture and flaked tuna. Top with egg. Serve.
